description:
Company Interactivity, with offices in Los Angeles, New York and Kiev, seeks iOS developers for positions in our comfortable Kiev office. (metro Lva Tolstogo)

 
Successful candidates should have the following skills:

  • Experience in buidling iPhone application is essential. We are looking for eager and fast learners with practical development experience.
  • Primary Experience in PHP development is a big plus


Experience with:

  • Objective C and Cocoa framework
  • Knowledge of iPhone SDK
  • Understanding of iPhone best practices development
  • XML, CSS, HTML, JavaScript
  • Version control systems: CVS, Subversion
  • UML diagrams
  • Bug tracking systems
  • Use case description


Personal skills:

  • High degree of independence, logical approach, fast-learner, motivated
  • Team player with real experience of work in remote distributed environment
  • Good bilingual communication skills (Russian or Ukrainian/English)


We offer:

  • Competitive salaries paid commensurate with experience and productivity.
  • Financial stability
  • 20 days paid vacation
  • Career growth by developing cutting-edge web applications for world-class clients.
  • A constant stream of new, challenging and interesting projects. Do work that you can be proud of.
  • Friendly team and enjoyable working environment in the very center of Kiev. (And of course, a cappuccino machine)
  • Flexible working schedule with day, night and weekend working hours available. We will also consider work from home arrangements.


Please send your detailed resume with work samples.
name: IOS developer
